Name: Blind Trust
About the game: Blind Trust is a two-player, cooperative game where the deaf leads the blind on a fantasy island. Navigate using only 3D sound as the blind Oracle, or lead the Oracle with magical sound beacons as the deaf Soldier. Work together to fight monsters, solve puzzles, and reach your ultimate goal.
Developers: Viswanath Atlu,Laurie Banks,Rohan Bhukan,Nick Burnham,Avinash Kalapala,Yash Kapani,Katharine Marsh,Ankur Rathore,Hardit Singh,Anoop Nihar Srinivas,Ryan Guanyuhao Jiang,Robert Zhu
